metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11071 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
SPIP 3.1 before 3.1.10 and 3.2 before 3.2.4 allows authenticated visitorsto execute arbitrary code on the host server because var_memotri ismishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11071` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.1.4-4~deb9u3build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.4-4~deb9u3build0.18.04.1').
